Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class RemoteView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable<PlayerCommand>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.RemoteView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<BoardProxy>, java.lang.Runnable
public class RemoteView
extends Observable<PlayerCommand>
implements Observer<BoardProxy>, java.lang.Runnable

  • Constructor Summary

    RemoteView​(java.net.Socket socket, Controller controller, java.lang.String player)
    constructor of the RemoteView class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void run()
    runs the RemoteView the main method of the RemoteView, it's in charge of scanning the input stream from the client
    void update​(BoardProxy message)
    update method (inherited from the Observer interface) called when the observed object is changed send to the client the object changed, the Board in form of a BoardProxy in this case.

    addObserver, notify, removeObserver

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • RemoteView

      public RemoteView​(java.net.Socket socket, Controller controller, java.lang.String player)
      constructor of the RemoteView class
      Parameters:
      socket - the client to communicate with
      controller - the controller of the match (one for all views)
      player - a string that represents the player associated to this view.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      runs the RemoteView the main method of the RemoteView, it's in charge of scanning the input stream from the client
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • update

      public void update​(BoardProxy message)
      update method (inherited from the Observer interface) called when the observed object is changed send to the client the object changed, the Board in form of a BoardProxy in this case. Also, handles the case in which a client unexpectedly disconnects
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<BoardProxy>
      Parameters:
      message - the changed object
